name: 511 Zhiktur
description:
In a military base, during the mid 80’s, 5 russian scientists experimented with genetic mutations. Now, what have their ambitions created? 511 Zhitkur is a strategy and puzzle game, with horror elements, in top-down view. The player takes the place of a security technician working at the military base Zhitkur when an infectious creature, result of one experiment, escapes quarantine. The mission is simple, help the soldiers to find a safe path to the scientists and back out by opening and closing the doors of the compound, while also keeping the creature from transmitting the virus to the survivors.

This is a submission for the global game jam 2018

Theme: Trasmission

Gamejam Page: https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/511-zhitkur

Credits: 

Producer - Anderson Rosa

Programmer : Valter Luiz Tavares

Artist : Beatriz Amazonas

Narrative and Level Designer - Erica Dias

Multiple functions - Guilherme Morgado
